page.title: 05GUITING POWER.PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The two villages in our area are run by Parish Councils, Guiting Power Parish Council and Naunton Parish Council. The Council in our village meets every second month, and any parishioners who wish may come and listen. Once a year, an Annual Parish Meeting is held, where parishioners may speak. The Council discusses such matters as planning permission for buildings, keeping the roads clear in winter, civil defence, footpaths and various charities. Parish Council members are elected by the parishioners, and they are each given a job to do. For example, one Councillor is a School Governor.
